html:
Photo: Courtesy of Free People.

This holiday season, we’ve found the gifts that feel great to get and even better to give. Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here.

Scrambling to secure a few more holiday gifts? We — and FP Movement — got you. The reader-favorite label is more than a one-stop wonder for all the fitness buffs and cozy connoisseurs in your life. Orders placed by December 18, 11:59 pm PT, will, indeed, arrive by December 24. 

Since time is of the essence, we’ve culled a gift edit full of athleisure essentials, lounge styles, and active accessories (all priced under $100). Whether it’s a sweet pair of $18 socks, a vibrant $30 bag, or a deliciously cozy $98 fleece, we’re sure those remaining on your list will be ecstatic to unwrap any of these Free People finds. (Pro tip: A FP Movement gift card always delights.) Peruse the best under-$100 gifts from Free People ahead.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

1 of 28

FP Movement Hit The Slopes Balaclava

The snowboarder or skier in your life will love this fleece balaclava to stylishly protect them from harsh winter elements.

2 of 28

FP Movement Quilted Carryall Bag

This oversized bag is one of FP Movement’s most popular products. It’s beloved by Refinery29 editors, too, as a versatile and spacious carry-all you can tote around everywhere from the gym to work. Everyone on your list deserves one.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

3 of 28

FP Movement Apres Ski Team Pom Beanie

Your giftee needn't be an avid skier to appreciate this fashion-forward beanie. It’s a fun, cold-weather staple that’ll stand out from other wintry neutrals. 

4 of 28

FP Movement Hot Shot Onesie

A kitschy holiday onesie? Pass. Opt for a more versatile all-in-one your giftee will actually want to live in. This style from the fan-favorite Hot Shot collection has a 4.7-out-of-5 star rating from over 2.5K reviewers, many of whom say they own several of the 16 color options.

5 of 28

FP Movement Never Better Foldover Pants

Rather than a pair of leggings (everyone has particular preferences), consider gifting a more versatile pair of pants. We’re loving these stretchy, buttery-soft flares with a foldover waistband that you can customize to your giftee's height. The red hue feels especially festive. 

6 of 28

FP Movement x Mayim 24oz Collapsible Carabiner Bottle

This collapsible silicone reusable bottle from Mayim is an editor-favorite favorite travel companion. Now, it’s available in a handful of new colors exclusive to FP Movement — a great buy for those with long commutes or frequent flyers. They can hook it onto their bag by the built-in carabiner clip — genius.

7 of 28

FP Movement Epic Mini Bra

This one’s for the minimalists — sleek, supportive, and made to move.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

8 of 28

FP Movement Good Karma Long Tank

 

A bold red tank for serving all the good holiday vibes. Your giftee can rock it while stretching, lounging, or tackling a last-minute wrapping marathon.

9 of 28

FP Movement Position Tunic Layer

Secure this ribbed midi dress for the cozy queen in your life — they'll layer it, lounge in it, and travel in it. A serious win.

10 of 28

FP Movement Volley V-Neck Pullover

 

Behold peak slouchy deliciousness (it nails the varsity aesthetic, too).

11 of 28

FP Movement Never Better Bike Shorts

These biker shorts are the perfect pairing with the Volley V-Neck Pullover on top, don’t you think?

12 of 28

FP Movement 28" Stirrup Legwarmers 

Winter is leg warmer season. We’re eyeing this sleek black pair — so cute with leggings in a dance class or styled with boots for a bold holiday look. 

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

13 of 28


FP Movement Cool Down Beanie 

Keep your giftee cozy in frigid temps with this chunky, ribbed beanie. Fans of this top-rated style note how the fabric keeps their heads warm without roasting.

14 of 28

FP Movement Never Better Long Tank

Business in the front, party in the back for the fitness queen on your list. It’s made from a sweat-wicking material with a built-in shelf bra for low-to-medium impact workouts, like Pilates.

15 of 28

FP Movement Quilted Mini Case

What’s the best follow-up gift to the much-loved quilted carryall bag? An adorable mini version. Much like its larger counterpart, it comes in lots of colors to coordinate with any outfit.

16 of 28

FP Movement Mountain High 1/2 Zip Fleece

Free People knows a thing or two about ultra-cozy styles, and this editor-favorite fleece pullover is a prime example. The relaxed half-zip can be worn on its own or layered up, and is great for outdoor winter activities and travel. Choosing this under-$100 gift is easy — picking a color will be harder.

17 of 28

FP Movement Quilted Duffle 

If your giftee already owns (and loves) the brand’s quilted carry-all, expand their puffy bag collection with the duffle version. It's the perfect carry-on or weekender bag for the stylish traveler in your life.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

18 of 28

FP Movement Carpe Diem Shorts

Run clubs seemed to multiply in 2024. So, for the new (or avid) runner on your list, wrap up a pair of running shorts that are as stylish as they are functional. This fluttery pair (crafted from water-resistant fabric) has built-in briefs, an interior pocket, and a no-slip waistband. Oh, and comes in 17 colors.

19 of 28

FP Movement Hot Shot Crossover Set

Loungewear coordinates ... for under $100? Sold. This muscle tee and ankle-pant set is pure luxury for chillax mode.

20 of 28

FP Movement Halftime Slides

Designed for pre- and post-workout wear, these slip-on slides (with super cushiony soles and strong traction) are the gift that keeps on giving. We love the bold color pop as your giftee’s studio-to-street shoes or at-home slippers.

21 of 28

FP Movement Final Call Hoodie

Everyone needs a wear-anywhere hoodie, and this oversized option is a total athleisure collection upgrade. The slouchy fit is totally effortless, with tons of rave reviews. One customer writes: “I have this hoodie in four colors. I just fell in love with them. Very soft and comfy.”

22 of 28

FP Movement Classic Ruffle Socks

Socks are a tried-and-true holiday gift, and this ruffled pair is special enough to dress up your giftee’s sneakers or ballet flats. Snag a few festive colors to give as a set or to split up among several lucky friends.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

23 of 28

FP Movement Hot Shot Mini Skort

Cold weather means indoor court time. This mini is a win for the tennis player in your life to keep their backhand on point throughout winter.

24 of 28

FP Movement Scout It Out Fleece Vest

This bow-adorned, water-resistant fleece vest will quickly become your giftee’s favorite layer, whether they wear it post-workout, while running errands, or during chilly camping trips.

25 of 28

FP Movement So Fly Henley Layer

A cozy (and vibrant!) ribbed henley top is sure to become any giftee's favorite. The snap buttons, oversized collar, and adorable sleeve pockets spruce up this version for a more gift-able feel.

26 of 28

FP Movement Champ Is Here Pants

A good pair of sweatpants go a long way. We're especially fond of this heritage green pair with throwback stripes that look so cool.

27 of 28

FP Movement x Yoga Design Lab Cork Yoga Block

Whether you know a master yogi or someone who’s new to downward dog, this biodegradable natural cork yoga block is a thoughtful, useful, and unexpectedly beautiful gift.  

28 of 28

FP Movement Hot Shot Tee Romper

Another one-and-done cozy outfit sure to please? This relaxed romper works for tennis matches, nature walks, or internet surfing.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT
